channel.title: God damn photoshop! I need help!
channel.description:
Man this is stupid, im on my way to design a website for a client and run into this wierd problem that will not go away even when i close and reload it. I finally got photoshop permenantly and its still acting funny wtf :mad:.
I can't use any tool on photoshop, all i get is a fat ass hand that doesnt change when on the image canvas. Anyone know how to get rid of this? I cant screeny it because the pointer, thats a hand in photoshop, it wont show up :mad:

item.title: God damn photoshop! I need help!
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

You have to uninstall and reinstall. It’s a known problem with Adobe, but they haven’t released a hotfix yet.

Read full topic
item.source: God damn photoshop! I need help!

item.title: God damn photoshop! I need help!
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Take a screenshoot anyway, it may let us see what the problem is without the pointer.

Read full topic
item.source: God damn photoshop! I need help!
